**sqlite3** 3.27.1 Last updated Feb. 8, 2019 # Upgrading 1. Download the "amalgamation" from [the download page](https://www.sqlite.org/download.html) 2. Replace `include/sqlite/sqlite3.h` and `source/sqlite3.c` with the new versions 3. Make sure everything still works. # License SQLite is [public domain](https://www.sqlite.org/copyright.html).
